key_title: Key to the genera of Centrolepidaceae

source.author: Conn, B.J.
source.title: Centrolepidaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: From: Conn, B.J. (1994). Centrolepidaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Inflorescence laterally flattened and spike-like; primary bracts 5–12; flowers distinct, not clustered
Inflorescence head-like; primary bracts 2, ± enclosing the inflorescence with their basal sheaths; flowers clustered into bisexual or female units (see note under family description)
